tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,
context: Teeth Grinding,Dental Fillings,Teeth Reshaping,GIC Tooth Fillings,Dental Sealant,
review:
Excellent homely behaviour and explain in detail the causes and how to take precautions and safe guard the teeth in all aspects.
Also explained what made what happened the tooth problem and resolved with good guidance.

tags: None
review: She is an excellent Dental Surgeon. I had gone for fixing a cap & extraction of a tooth. While extraction though it was a difficult one she did the job within 10 min & that to without any pain! For injection her hand is very lighter. In short I have come across clinically very sound Dr Mrs Meena Mistry. I will strongly recommend Dr Meena to all my friends/relatives. Thanks.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: I have stared taking treatment from 30th Oct 21,as doctor explained I have multiple problems. So yesterday first she removed one old bridge from my right side & cleaned it & for left side I have a deep cavity which is cleaned up cement filling is done, on Monday the second stage will be carried out. Next I have to Go through root canal for one tooth. today I am feeling much better & comfortable to eat normal food, thanks to doctor.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Have been going to her since 3years. She is a very competent and experienced doctor. Most important thing is that she is very skilled and has a very light hand for a dentist which helps in patient comfort. Communicates very well and is very direct but friendly..

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,
review: Doctor is practical, ************** friendly With Very good skills. I will recommend to friends and relatives. Even the assistant is good, cooperative and well behaved.
